ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:51:30 [Issue ID 4000-22445] urn:comicvine:4000-22445 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:43:08. [Issue ID 36671]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jackdaw steals fighter robot Megalith from the Gamma Base!
Hulk goes to the Gamma base to find Betty Ross and Rick Jones, after being unable to find them at the desert cave. However, Jackdaw reaches the base and steals Megalith, a massive fighting robot. Will Bruce transform into the Hulk? Who is Jackdaw working for?
ComicInfo.Tags: Vapor,Vector,Bereet,Betty Ross,Rick Jones,Hulk's Underground Cave,Blackbird,Ironclad,Hulk,Gamma Base,U-Foes,New Mexico,X-Ray,Megalith
ComicInfo.Title: When Somebody's That Big, You Just Gotta Call Him... Megalith!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
